title: GATED COMMUNITY, COURTESY PATROL, ON-SITE STAFF
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'ELEVATE YOUR LIFESTYLE!', '\xa0  Diamond Hillside is your destination for spacious one and two-bedroom apartment homes located in Pittsburg, California.', 'We are centrally located near restaurants, shops, and public transportation.', 'You can’t go wrong with these East Bay apartments.', 'You can enjoy a dip in our Resort Style Pool or workout in a new and improved Clubhouse and Fitness Center.', '\xa0\xa0  Diamond Hillside is located right across the street from Los Medanos College and is in close proximity to Tri-Delta transit,\xa0the Antioch Shopping Mall, and other popular shopping and dining venues.', ' Come check out Diamond Hillside today!', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'If you are looking for apartments in Pittsburg, Concord, Brentwood, Oakley, and Clayton, Diamond Hillside Apartments is a great choice.', 'In addition, we are a great option for renters looking to move from the Greater Bay Area in Easy Bay, Walnut Creek, and Hayward area.', 'Call us today!']
